jd: From: Ashruf, Livemindz shaik@livemindz.com Reply to: shaik@livemindz.com HiThis is Ashruf from Livemindz, here is a JD of a Job opportunity, If you are interested and your skills are matching with the Requirement please share your interest. Job Title: AWS – Databricks Architect (12 +Yrs of Experience) Location: San Diego, CA (Onsite – 3 days)Duration: 12+ Montths Wipro, Job DescriptionLead and manage a team of engineers and Sr engineers by providing guidance, mentorship, and fostering a collaborative work environment.Establish and maintain positive relationships with client stack holdersConsult with client on project status, proposals, and technical issues and provide post-implementation support to themFacilitates communication and collaboration between onshore and offshore teams, and ensure the successful design, development and execution of the product\project\deliverables on timeExperience in POC development, Capacity sizing, Tool Evaluation MUST HavePossess excellent written and verbal communication skills.Ability to run ETL jobs in DatabricksUnity catalog with delta, MongoDB, regular s3 based parquet filesDelta format based S3Ability to articulate pros and cons of delta formatAbility to run Databricks with AWS glue catalogMonitoring of Databricks jobsOperations related experience of Databricks jobsBest practices of setting up nested ETL jobsScheduling of jobs in DatabricksPassing runtime parameters to ETL jobsHandling experience in AWS in data engineering projectAbility to coordinate/work with team in IndiaGood to HaveExperience in client facing role Thanks and Regards Shaik Khaja MoinuddinShaik@livemindz.comL'1505 LBJ Freeway, Suit #245, Farmers Branch TX, 75234https://livemindz.com/
